mainText:
I am deeply appreciative of the profound effect Steve Jobs has had on the
world in such a variety of areas. Many will try, likely through Steve's own
inspiration, but none will replace him.  I am most saddened for the Jobs
family and wish them peace and comfort in their loss.  Having lost my own
incredible mother only a short time ago, I know well how they must feel.  My
sincerest wishes.
author: Bruce
